DOC.brief_summary: We investigate correlation maternal anxiety age , body mass index ( BMI ) , parity-gravidity , patient satisfaction , antenatal care , postoperative pain accord emergent elective C/S general anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Stress During Elective Emergency Cesarean Operations
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman age ≥18 year ( gestational age : 3740 week ) underwent emergent elective C/S . patient cardiopulmonary , renal , hepatic psychiatric disease , obstetricfetal anomaly weigh ≥ 100 kg exclude .
